FightMessage.DieAttacker: You have burned $N to death!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You have been burned to death by $n!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n has burned $N to death!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You miss $N with your burning hands.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n reaches for you with burning hands, but misses!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to burn $N, but $E escapes!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You burn $N with your hot little hands!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You cry out in pain as $n grabs you with burning hands!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N cries out as $n burns $M!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your attempt to burn $N nears BLASPHEMY!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: The pitiful creature before you tries to burn you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: Unaware of the risks, $n tries to burn $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your lightning bolt kills $N!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You are electrocuted to death by a lightning bolt sent by $n!
FightMessage.DieRoom: The dead body of $N sizzles in the heat from a lightning bolt sent by $n!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your lightning bolt scores the ground in front of $N, a misser!
FightMessage.MissVictim: The ground before you is scored as $n misses you with lightning!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N jumps backwards in time to avoid lightning sent by $n!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You hit $N with your lightning, bullseye!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You are hit by lightning sent by $n, OUCH!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N screams in pain as lightning from $n penetrates $M!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N stops your lightning with a single gesture, BEWARE!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You stop $n's lightning with a sure hand, no time for children's games...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n's lightning disappears as $N makes a simple gesture.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You chill $N, remember to put flowers on $S grave...
FightMessage.DieVictim: You feel chilled by $n and then you feel no more -- R.I.P.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n touches $N who slumps to the ground as a dead lump, rather chilly isn't it?
FightMessage.MissAttacker: The atmosphere turns chilly as you miss $N!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You dodge $n and $s chill touch!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries unsuccesfully to chill $N!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You chill $N!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You feel your life flowing away as $n chills you!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n chills $N who suddenly seem less lively!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Are you trying to chill $N? -- what a joke!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to chill you, what a laugh...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N starts to laugh as $n turns chilly!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: YOU KILLED $N!!! -- don't you feel ashamed...
FightMessage.DieVictim: Your head is filled with all the colors of the rainbow before it bursts!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n makes $N into a colorful corpse!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your spray of color misses $N -- what a dull world...
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n unsuccesfully tries to add color to your life!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n splashes color everywhere except $N.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: Your own private rainbow hits $N in the face -- WOWIE!!
FightMessage.HitVictim: A sudden burst of colors sends you reeling!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n throws colors at $N who in vain tries to escape!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your spray of colors turn into butterflies as $N frowns.
FightMessage.GodVictim: Your frown is enough to turn $n's color spray into little butterflies.
FightMessage.GodRoom: The air is filled with butterflies as $N frowns at $n's color spray.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is dissolved by your goodness.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n dissolves you, you regret having been so evil, and die...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n completely dissolves $N!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is unaffected by your goodness!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n thinks that $e is really good, and tries to dispell you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N laughs at $n as $e tries to dispell $M!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N shivers and suffers from $S evilness!
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n makes your soul hurt and suffer!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n makes $N's evil spirit shiver and suffer!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Did you really expect $M to suffer?
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n unfruitfully tries to dispell you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n is stupid...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: The earth opens beneath $N's feet and swallows $M whole!
FightMessage.DieVictim: The earth opens beneath your feet and swallows you whole!
FightMessage.DieRoom: The earth opens beneath $N's feet and swallows $M whole!

FightMessage.MissRoom: $N desperately tries to keep $S balance as the earth shakes beneath $S feet!

FightMessage.HitVictim: You fall down and hurt yourself!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N falls down and hurts $Mself!

FightMessage.GodVictim: You gracefully levitate as the earth shifts underneath you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N gracefully levitates as the earth shifts beneath $S feet under $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N crumples as you kill $M by draining $S energy!

FightMessage.DieRoom: $n drains the energy of $N who crumples as a lifeless cocoon!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You need more draining lessons...
FightMessage.MissVictim: Luckily for you $n slept during draining-lessons!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n fails to drain $N -- what a waste of energy!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You drain $N of some of $S energy!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You feel less energic as $n drains you!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n drains $N -- what a waste of energy!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You waste energy trying to drain $N!
FightMessage.GodVictim: How amusing -- $n tries to drain you!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N's eyes twinkle with laughter as $n tries to drain $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your fireball hits $N with full force, causing an immediate death!
FightMessage.DieVictim: As you burst into flames of death $n grins evilly...
FightMessage.DieRoom: The heat from a fireball from $n turns $N into a charred corpse!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your fireball blooms few feet before $N who claps $S hands in wonder.

FightMessage.HitRoom: $n smirks as $s fireball explodes into the face of $N!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: How shameful to throw fireballs at a GOD!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You choose to ignore $n's shameful attempt to fireball you.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: As you finish the incantation of the spell, $N falls dead due to the amount of harm $E takes!

FightMessage.MissRoom: Showing remarkable dexterity, $N avoids $n's reach and subsequent harm spell.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You watch the pained expression on $N's face as you hit $M with your harm spell.

FightMessage.HitRoom: A large grin crosses $n's face as $s harm spell causes $N grievous pain.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Harm a god? Are you serious? Of course $N avoids it casually.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to harm you. Poor sod.
FightMessage.GodRoom: What a buffoon! $n looks somewhat perturbed as $N ignores the recently cast harm spell.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your lightning bolt shatters $N to pieces!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: The magic missile tears away the remaining life of $N!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N dies while looking rather shocked!

FightMessage.GodVictim: These puny creatures are shocking at times...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is dissolved by your evil.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N makes a strange sound but is suddenly very silent as you place $p in $S back.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You punch $N's head with a blow that crushes $S skull!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You drive a sting directly into the heart of $N, killing $M!

FightMessage.MissVictim: $n drives $s stinging blow at you, barely missing!
FightMessage.MissRoom: You watch in fright as $n stings at $N, missing by mere inches!

FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to sting you, somewhat comical to tell the truth.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n stings at $N, then looks horrified as $N grins at $m!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You violently sting $N repeatedly, causing $S death!

FightMessage.DieRoom: As $n stings $N all over the place, $N falls lifeless to the ground.

FightMessage.MissRoom: You watch on as $n stings at $N, but misses!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You sting at $N, and all that happens is that $E slaps himself as if a mosquito bit $M.
FightMessage.GodVictim: Was that a bee you just felt? Oh.. wait, it was just $n.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N begins to slap at $Mself as $n tries to sting $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You whip $N's head right off of $S body!

FightMessage.GodVictim: Pathetic little $n is trying to whip you... how cute.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your dextrous whip messily tears $N's torso right off!

FightMessage.MissAttacker: You fruitlessly try to bludgeon $N.
FightMessage.MissVictim: You easily dodge $n's attempt to bludgeon you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to bludgeon $N who easily avoids the blow.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your attempt to bludgeon $N fails, luckily for you $N has a good sense of humor!
FightMessage.GodVictim: Your patience is tried when $n tries to clobber you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N restrains $Mself from zapping $n when $e attempts to bludgeon the mighty one.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your relentless bludgeoning of $N finally results in $S broken neck!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n's relentless bludgeoning of you finally results in your broken neck!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n's relentless bludgeoning of $N finally results in $N's broken neck!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You try to bludgeon $N who simply laughs at you.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to bludgeon you, but you avoid $m and laugh.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N laughs at $n's attempt to bludgeon $M.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your attempt to bludgeon $N fails, luckily for you $N has a good sense of humor!
FightMessage.GodVictim: Your patience is tried when $n tries to clobber you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N restrains $Mself from zapping $n when $e attempts to bludgeon the mighty one.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You crush $N right out of existence!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n crushes you right out of existence!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n crushes $N right out of existence!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You try to crush $N who jumps out of the way!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to crush you but you jump out of the way!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to crush $N who jumps out of the way!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: A pox on thee and thy pitiful crush on $N!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n seems to have a crush on you...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n seems to have a crush on $N...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You crush $N's entire body, making a terrible mess!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n crushes your entire body, making a terrible mess!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n crushes $N's entire body, making a terrible mess!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You hopelessly try to crush $N.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n hopelessly tries to crush you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n hopelessly tries to crush $N.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: A pox on thee and thy pitiful crush on $N!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n seems to have a crush on you...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n seems to have a crush on $N...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You pound $N right into the ground!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n pounds you six feet under.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n pounds $N mightily on the head, crushing $S entire body!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You pound at the air as $N nimbly steps out of the way!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You jump out of the way in a panic as $n pounds at you!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n looks perturbed as $s pound misses $N!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You pound $N! And $E thanks you for it? *boggle*
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n gives you a pound. Wonder what the exchange rate is...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n starts giving pounds to $N who begins to count the money.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You pound on $N with reckless abandon when you realize that $E is dead.
FightMessage.DieVictim: With $s reckless pounding attacks, you succomb to death.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N falls under $n's pounding blows, yet $n continues $s attack!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You hear the air whistle as you split the air with your pound!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n pounds in your direction, causing a whistling sound!
FightMessage.MissRoom: With a loud whistle through the air, $n misses $s pounding attack upon $N!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Who are you trying to kid?
FightMessage.GodVictim: Hmmm... I think you missed the joke that $n was trying to tell you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N looks somewhat perplexed as $n tries to pound him!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You claw $N's face right off!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n claws your face right off!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n claws $N's face right off!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You try to claw at $N but miss!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to claw at you but misses by a hair!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to claw at $N, missing by a hair!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You dummy! Not the claw, the claw!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at you!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at $N!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your razor-sharp claws rip $N wide open!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n's razor-sharp claws rip you wide open!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n's razor-sharp claws rip $N wide open!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You try to claw at $N but almost nick yourself instead!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to claw at you but nearly nicks $mself instead!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to claw at $N but nearly nicks $mself instead!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You dummy! Not the claw, the claw!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at you!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at $N!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You maul $N across the chest and $E screams in pain as $E falls lifeless to the ground.
FightMessage.DieVictim: As $n mauls you in the chest, you feel a searing pain... then nothing.
FightMessage.DieRoom: With a brutal maul to the chest, $n slaughters $N!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You swing wildly with your maul, almost hitting yourself!
FightMessage.MissVictim: Phew! $n missed you with $s wild maul!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n mauls at $N, missing wildly!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Mauling a God? What would your poor mother think? Of course, you probably wouldn't hesitate to maul her too.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to maul you, and as $e fails, looks quite horrified. How pleasant.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N laughs as $n tries to maul $M. How comical.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You bring $N within the thrashing of $S life, and then thrash $M one last time, killing $M.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n thrashes you violently, and you die.
FightMessage.DieRoom: With a horrible thrashing, $N falls lifeless under $n's blows!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You miss your thrash against $N!
FightMessage.MissVictim: What a stroke of luck, $n seems to have missed you with $s thrash!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n thrashes madly at $N, missing $M!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Thrash a God? More likely that $N would thrash you, don't you think?
FightMessage.GodVictim: What a fool, $n tried to thrash you. *sigh*
FightMessage.GodRoom: Looking rather silly, $n tries to thrash at $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You succesfully pierce $N and $S dead body falls to the ground in a lifeless heap.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n pierces you. You are no longer a living member of this world -- R.I.P.!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n pierces $N whose suddenly lifeless body falls to the ground!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You try to pierce $N but pierce the air instead!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n pierces holes in the air.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to pierce air instead of fighting $N.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: The mighty $N begins to think you a nuisance!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: Your patience is almost gone when you stare back at $n.
FightMessage.GodRoom: The air is loaded when $N angrily wards off a piercing attack from $n.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You pierce $N's heart, you heartbreaker you...
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n breaks your heart, goodbye cruel world...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n pierces the heart of $N who falls to the ground clutching at the wound!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You lunge at $N without managing to pierce $M.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to pierce you but fails miserably.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n lunges at $N but can't pierce $M.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: The great $N sends you a piercing look, OOPS!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You return $n's pierce with a piercing look, hmmm...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N returns $n's pierce with a piercing look, hmmm...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You blast $N with all of your might, killing $M!
FightMessage.DieVictim: With $s powerful blast, $n tears your life from your body!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N falls lifeless as $n's blast rips $M apart!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You blast wildly, missing $N by a mere inch or two!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You skillfully avoid $n's wild blast!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n misses $N with $s wild blast! What luck $N seems to have!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Are you kidding? What do you expect your feeble blast to do to $N?
FightMessage.GodVictim: Heh. $n tried to blast you. Good thing you have blastproof armour.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n looks afraid of the consequences as $e tries fruitlessly to blast $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You punch at $N causing $S face to collapse under the blow, blood everywhere. Doesn't look like $N will recover. Ever.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n's forceful punch causes you to see red, until you die shortly thereafter.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n punches $N right in the face! There is blood everywhere, and $N seems to be dead!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You miss $N with your haymaker!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n throws a haymaker at you which whistles by your ear!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n just misses $N with a strong punch!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Punch a God? May be smarter to punch a wall for a bit. You might do more damage to it.
FightMessage.GodVictim: Is that a quiet whistling noise you hear as $n is swinging $s fist about?
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n looks like $e would prefer to have punched a wall rather than trying to punch $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You stab $N through the heart! Instant death!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n drives a stab at you, it pierces your heart! RIP!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n stabs brutally at $N, killing him as $N is impaled by $n!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You stab at $N, missing!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n misses a particularily nasty stab in your direction!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n stabs at $N! $e misses!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You stab at $N! Too bad $E's a god, huh?
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n stabs at you! Lucky for you that you are immune to this kind of thing.
FightMessage.GodRoom: You watch in pity as $n stabs towards $N missing in the most futile way possible!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You stab forth towards $N, hitting $M in the abdomen causing a messy but mortal wound!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n stabs you in the stomach, and you watch your insides fall out as you die.
FightMessage.DieRoom: Making a mess of $N, $n kills $M with a stab to the midsection.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You stab at $N, barely missing $M!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n stabs at you, missing by a good mile or so!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N grins at $n as the stab sent by $n goes wide!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Gods can't be stabbed, did noone ever teach you that? And $N just so happens to be one.
FightMessage.GodVictim: It sure is nice being a god isn't it... especially since $n can't hit you with $s stabs.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n stabs at $N only to discover $N's immunity to stabbing weapons.

FightMessage.DieVictim: You feel wounded -- too wounded -- you die...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N lies suffering on the ground until no blood is left in $S body.
FightMessage.MissVictim: suffer miss victim - should never see.
FightMessage.MissRoom: suffer miss room - should never see.
FightMessage.HitVictim: You lie on the ground suffering from your terrible wounds...
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N lies helplessly on the ground and suffers...
FightMessage.GodVictim: Suffer god victim - should never see.
FightMessage.GodRoom: Suffer god room - should never see.

FightMessage.DieVictim: You can only lie still as your last heartbeat ebbs...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N suffers from bloodlack, and the lack of a beating heart...
FightMessage.MissVictim: suffer miss victim - should never see.
FightMessage.MissRoom: suffer miss room - should never see.
FightMessage.HitVictim: You lie on the ground suffering from bleeding wounds...
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N lies immobile on the ground, suffering...
FightMessage.GodVictim: Suffer god victim -- should never see.
FightMessage.GodRoom: Suffer god room -- should never see.

FightMessage.DieVictim: Poison burns intensely in your veins... you shiver... you die.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N has a few cramps and dies, suffering.
FightMessage.MissVictim: poison miss victim - should never see.
FightMessage.MissRoom: poison miss room - should never see.
FightMessage.HitVictim: You feel burning poison in your blood, and suffer.
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N looks really sick and shivers uncomfortably.
FightMessage.GodVictim: You have become poisoned somehow.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N has somehow become poisioned.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is killed by fire breath.
FightMessage.DieVictim: You are burned to ash, as $n breathes on you.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n makes $N to ash.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is missed by fire breath.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n breathes fire at you, but you avoids it.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N avoids $n's firebreath.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N is hit by fire breath.
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n burns you.
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N is partly made ash, as $n breaths fire.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N, being immortal, is just warmed.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n warms you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n warms $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is killed by gas breath.
FightMessage.DieVictim: You die from the gas $n breathes on you.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n kills $N with a gas breath.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is missed by gas breath.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n breathes gas at you, but it has no effect.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N avoids $n's gas.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N is hit by gas breath.
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n gasses you.
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N is gassed by $n.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N is immortal, so can't be gassed.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n wants to gas you, but can't.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n tries to gas $N, but can't.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is killed by frost breath.
FightMessage.DieVictim: You are frozen to ice, as $n breathes on you.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n makes $N to ice.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is missed by frost breath.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n breathes frost at you, but you avoid it.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N avoids $n's frost breath.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N is hit by frost breath.
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n freezes you with $s breath.
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N is partly made ice, as $n breathes frost.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N is immortal, and thus avoids your frost breath.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n supplies you with air conditioning.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n supplies $N with air conditioning.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is killed by your acid breath.
FightMessage.DieVictim: You are corroded to nothing, as $n breathes on you.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n corrodes $N to nothing.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is missed by acid.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n breathes acid at you, but you avoids it.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N avoids $n's acidbreath.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N is hit by acid.
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n corrodes you.
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N is corroded as $n breaths acid.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N is immortal, and thus is immune to acid.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n helps you clean your hands with a little acid.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n helps $N cleaning.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is killed by your lightning breath.
FightMessage.DieVictim: You are killed by $n's lightning breath.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n killes $N with a lightning breath.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is missed by your lightning breath.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n breathes lightning at you, but you avoids it.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N avoids $n's lightning breath.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N is hit by your lightning breath.
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n hits you with a lightning breath.
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N is hit by $n's lightning breath.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N is immortal and immune to lightning breath.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to breath lightning upon you.
